text_block_list.text:
It's afternoon on a Saturday. I'm on my way 
back to the station after running an errand.

Oh, Tray-chan. 
Nice coincidence. Yeah!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I'm about to head to the cinema to see if there 
are any movies worth watching. Wanna join me?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: Sounds good! I'm free this afternoon.

text_block_list.text:
I can't help but get excited when I'm at the cinema. 
I wonder if it's the smell of the butter and caramel?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: <size=39>Haha, you may be right. So, which movie?</size>

text_block_list.text: Well... How about you choose, Tray-chan? No need to consider my tastes, I'm fine with watching anything. Go on!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I take a look at the movies that are playing soon. 
There's one that stands out...
choice_data_list: <size=41>R... "Revolver and Underfloor Heating"?</size>

text_block_list.text:
Two completely unrelated words. 
The trailer suggests it's an over-the-top action movie 
full of explosions...

Haha. I figured you'd choose that one. 
I spotted it as well.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I like that director. 
They keep making unique movies.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
They keep coming up with interesting challenges for 
themselves, and absolutely demolish every previous release 
with their new ones. I love it!
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: Oh, it's by them? We gotta see that!

text_block_list.text:
Sounds like you made your choice. 
Let's grab some tickets!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Hm hmm. About the seats... What do you prefer? 
Smack-dab in the middle or more on the side?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: I like to sit in the center if possible.

text_block_list.text:
Agreed. Sitting in the middle gives the best experience, 
even if it can be a little crowded. And to be honest, 
I already bought the tickets while you were thinking.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, that's right! The cinema atmosphere really 
makes you want to buy everything.
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: P-Please restrain a bit..!

text_block_list.text:
There's still time until it starts. How about 
we explore every nook and cranny of this place?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Hey, let me guess if you want to buy popcorn or not. 
'Kay?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: Sure. What do you think?

text_block_list.text:
Hehe. My prediction: You'll buy. The movie has many 
explosions, which means there'll be plenty of opportunities 
to munch on some popcorn.
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: ... Damn, you got me!

text_block_list.text:
Heck yeah, my info was right! 
That's +500 Tray-chan points for me!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Don't you think waiting for the movie to start is the best 
part of going to the cinema? It's exciting to wonder 
what the movie might be like.
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: Exactly my thoughts!

text_block_list.text:
And so, after spending some time together, it was about 
time for the movie to begin. I follow the visibly excited 
Transcend into the hall.

That movie exceeded my expectations! I couldn't 
help myself but speak my thoughts about this 
nonstop action masterpiece!
choice_data_list: That was awesome!
That was awesome!

text_block_list.text: Oh, did the movie check all the boxes for you?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: You bet! To start, the composition—
You bet! To start, the composition—

text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I get you. That director is very good at action movies. 
And? Any other points of interest?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: <size=40>Don't even get me started on the script—</size>

text_block_list.text:
Ahaha. That sure was a surprise right at the end. 
And? Keep that trademark Tray-chan review going!
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: <size=41>(Wait... Am I the only one talking here?)</size>
<size=41>(Wait... Am I the only one talking here?)</size>

text_block_list.text:
With that thought in the back of my head, a sense of unease 
washed over me. Did I incorrectly assume she felt the same 
about the movie as me? I'm honestly a bit startled...

Oh, I'm out of coffee. 
Want another one as well?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: Did you... Not like the movie?

text_block_list.text: Huh?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Well... Um... 
Aha, really?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: Were you just playing along?

text_block_list.text:
Oh... Gosh. 
You saw through me, huh?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: Alright then, I'll tell you what I thought of it.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: There wasn't the usual challenge in this one.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
This director has always posed a special challenge for 
themselves with every movie. Like not having the main 
character speak, or filming the entire thing on a phone.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
For this one, they just took all the things that worked 
previously and crammed them together. 
It was a big turn-off for me.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Now it finally makes sense to me. 
She...
choice_data_list: You couldn't get excited?
You couldn't get excited?

text_block_list.text:
Yeah... That's basically it. But I did like that one scene. 
That big gunpowder explosion of the skyscraper!
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: Surely that got you excited, right?
Surely that got you excited, right?

text_block_list.text: Sure, it got me excited alright! But like, not excited excited, if you get what I mean.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Like, it was funny. I laughed a ton! But like, 
I wanted to be excited by whatever challenge 
the director gave themselves...
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: <size=38>And when the dead body started moving..?</size>

text_block_list.text:
That was scary as heck! But not exciting... 
Hey, are you bringing that up on purpose?!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
The thing about the photography... Oh, has the clock glitched 
out or is it really this late already? I've got so much more 
to talk about!
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: You were so into it, too!

text_block_list.text:
Haha. Let's call it a wrap and continue another time, 'kay? 
Time to say goodbye for now.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: (...I thought I saw through them.)
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
(I thought it'd be better if I played along. Hiding my 
true feelings. Surely they wouldn't notice. But...)
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: "Did you... Not like the movie?"

(I miscalculated... 
There's still a lot more to learn about them.)
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: ... Hehe.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: Oh man... That got me excited.
text_block_list.name: Transcend
